channel.title: Serj Tankian
channel.description:
Not sure if we've had a serj thread here before.
Anyways yesterday i remembered a song I heard by Serj a while ago [Ex lead singer from System of a down?] so i typed his name in on youtube and realised that he had released a few more songs. I really enjoyed his new songs.
Give him a listen, I'm sure a few people will like them:
Empty Walls - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZSKvSz1roQ Lie Lie Lie - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GbN9EXYTGnA Sky is over - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GY9kQcWLvEM&feature=related
also i think the videos for them are quite good, so be sure to watch them too!
Enjoy and remember, if it sounds good - enjoy it, don't think about stupid labels like genre that the music has.

item.title: Serj Tankian

@system wrote:

Serj is awesome.

Hope SOAD do get back together.

item.title: Serj Tankian
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

whaddafux… It was like a month ago, on their message board they posted that there will be NO reunion :\ and now theyre not spliting? WTF !? make thier minds up…

But theyre are on a ‘haitus’ atm.

[code]
QUOTE FROM MESSAGE BOARD

System of a Down are on hiatus. This does not mean that they have split up, quite the opposite. It just means they are not currently touring or recording as a band at the moment.

As such, they will not be able to tour your country, so there is no point in asking.

Daron is working on a solo project called Scars on Broadway.

en.wikipedia.org

Daron Malakian and Scars on Broadway

Daron Malakian and Scars on Broadway (previously known as just Scars on Broadway) is an American rock band, founded by System of a Down member Daron Malakian. The band's eponymous debut album was released on July 29, 2008. In late 2008, the band entered a hiatus, with Malakian citing a lack of enthusiasm and "his heart not being into touring", as the primary reasons for the band's cessation. Despite reforming with various line-up changes in 2010 and 2012, and announcing a second album, the band ...


http://www.myspace.com/scarsonbroadway

Serj is working on his own solo material and continuing work on his record lable.

Serj Tankian

Serjical Strike Records

Serjical Strike Records was founded in April of 2001 by Serj Tankian with the premise of casting away the restrictions of large scale record labels and set its sites on creating a unique and imaginative brand that presents a large spectrum of...

Shavo is working with a band called Achozen.
http://www.myspace.com/achozen

John is opening his own comic business.

Torpedo Comics

Torpedo Comics | Comic Books, Collectibles, Trade Paperbacks

Looking to buy comic books, collectibles, or trade paperbacks online? Torpedo Comics has what you're looking for!

It is worth noting that on a recent appearance on Loveline, John and Shavo let it be known that three of the band, minus Serj, have been getting together for “jam sessions”. This should fill you guys with hope for the future.

Also, check out the movie Screamers for some band action.
http://www.screamersmovie.com/ [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Serj Tankian
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Where did you see that?

I went on there “Official” website (http://www.systemofadown.com)
and it says as follows:

[quote=systemofadown.com]
TO ALL SYSTEM OF A DOWN FANS:
Although we’re on hiatus, we are not idle. Expect our solo debuts, including Serj Tankian’s “Elect the Dead” out now, Daron and John’s Scars on Broadway early 2008, and Shavo’s Achozen, also slated for 2008. Many thanks to all of our fans who continue to spread the musical and spiritual message that is System of A Down.

Read full topic

item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:9, topic:194327”][quote author=Java © ? link=topic=258599.msg2176344#msg2176344 date=1207840096]
He’s so weird but so awesome and his voice is so cool.
[/quote]
I like empty walls, there was another song I liked from him that had a lot of people holding signs with their problems or something, don’t remember it’s name though.[/quote]Remember it now, it was Saving Us.

Read full topic

item.title: Serj Tankian
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

They’re not split up. They’re on hiatus. It’s like splitting up - except whoever’s on hiatus gets back together after a period of being apart. Hopefully he hasn’t decided to continue down the path of a solo artist. He must prefer it… So I take back what I just said. Whatever makes him happy; either way the music’s good and interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Serj Tankian

eczema3:

TBH, i thought he was good, till he decided to go perm solo and split soad up for good

I heard SOAD were still workign with serj. Though I don’t have a clue where I heard that from.
I love('d) SOAD

item.title: Serj Tankian
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

‘Empty Walls’, ‘Saving Us’ and ‘Unthinking Majority’ are my favourites. I love Serj’s voice - it’s really unique - my love for him stems from System of a Down. He’s a really intelligent guy, too.

Read full topic
